subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The coolest head in tennis once again ruled the evening as Roger Federer defended his title in Melbourne and won his 10th Grand Slam singles title with a 7-6 (2), 6-4, 6-4 victory over Fernando González.
snippet: The coolest head in tennis once again ruled the evening as Roger Federer defended his title in Melbourne and won his 10th Grand Slam singles title with a 7-6 (2), 6-4, 6-4 victory over Fernando González.
